Posts.Content: Yes. And the fast track is to your advantage. People may tell you not to worry, but, of course, you will. However, it appears that your doctors are on top of the situation. Try to allow that to ease your mind.
Posts.Title: scared, fast tracked today

Posts.Content: Unusual changes are normal but you are wise to inform the doctor of this new development.
Posts.Title: Is this normal after breast surgery?

Posts.Content: Worry is premature, but you should definitely see a physician. Such will ease your mind and catch any problem early.
Posts.Title: Pain in The right breast
